remarks: Convert an operation distributive law to class notation.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2013.)
statement:
caovdi.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
caovdi.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
caovdi.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
caovdi.4 $e |- ( x G ( y F z ) ) = ( ( x G y ) F ( x G z ) ) $.
caovdi $p |- ( A G ( B F C ) ) = ( ( A G B ) F ( A G C ) ) $.
